info.name: Sensei Machine Learning API
info.description:
Sensei Machine Learning API provides a mechanism for data scientists to organize and manage ML services from algorithm onboarding through experimentation and to service deployment.

Related documentation:
  * [Data Science Workspace overview](https://www.adobe.io/apis/experienceplatform/home/data-science-workspace/dsw-overview.html)
  * [Data Science Workspace terminology](https://www.adobe.io/apis/experienceplatform/home/data-science-workspace/dsw-overview.html#!api-specification/markdown/narrative/technical_overview/data_science_workspace_overview/dsw_overview.md#terminology)


Notes: 
  * PLATFORM Gateway URL: https://<span>platform.adobe.io/ 
  * Base path for this API: /data/sensei
  * Example of a complete path: https://<span>platform.adobe.io/data/sensei/engines
  * All service calls require the headers `Authorization`, `x-gw-ims-org-id`, and `x-api-key`. For more information on how to obtain these, please see the [authentication tutorial](https://www.adobe.io/apis/experienceplatform/home/tutorials/alltutorials.html#!api-specification/markdown/narrative/tutorials/authenticate_to_acp_tutorial/authenticate_to_acp_tutorial.md).

item.name: Engines
Retrieve a list of all engines.

request.description: Lists all engines providing mechanisms for pagination, filtering, and sorting.
Creates a new Engine
Get Docker registry information
Retrieves a specific Engine
Updates a specific Engine

item.name: Delete an existing Engine by ID.

request.description: Deletes a specific Engine

item.description: Engines act as an umbrella entity holding all machine learning instances. This is tied to a Docker image, Java archive, or EGG file which contains machine  learning logic to train and score a Model.

item.name: MLInstances
Retrieve a list of MLInstances matching given criteria.

request.description: MLInstances may be searched by name or tags.
Creates a new MLInstance of an Engine
Deletes all MLinstances for provided engineId.

item.name: Delete an existing MLInstance by ID.

item.description: MLInstances represent the combination of a specific Engine with particular set  of configurations. An instance is often use-case specific for a customer or client.

item.name: Experiments
Retrieve all experiments for a MLInstance.

request.description: Deletes all experiments for provided mlInstance

item.name: Retrieve a list of all runs for an experiment by ID.
Run an experiment with parameter values.
Retrieve the details of an experiment run by ID.
Retrieve the status of an experiment run by ID.

item.description: A data scientist conducts multiple experiments to arrive at a high-performing Model while training. This can include changing datasets, features, learning parameters, and hardware.

item.name: Models
Retrieve a list of all Models.

request.description: List all Models providing mechanisms for pagination, filtering, and sorting.
Creates a Model for a particular Engine and MLinstance
Retrieves a specific Model
Update an existing Model
Deletes a specific Model

item.name: Lookup a binary Model artifact by ID.
Retrieve a list of transcodings for a model by ID.
Create a new transcoding for a Model by ID.
Lookup a Model transcoding by ID.

item.description: Allows machine learning Model management and registration (Model artifact that is created by the training process).

item.name: Insights

request.description: Lists all insights for all experiment runs
Creates a new Model insight
Retrieves a specific insight

item.name: Retrieve a list of default metrics for algorithms.

request.description: Lists all default metrics available for algorithms

item.description: Insights conatin metrics which are used to empower a  data scientist to evaluate and choose optimal ML Models by displaying  relevant evaluation metrics.

item.name: MLServices
Retrieve a list of MLServices matching given criteria.

request.description: MLServices may be searched by name or tags.
Creates a new MLService of an MLInstance
Deletes all MLServices for provided mlInstanceId

item.name: Delete an existing MLService by ID.

item.description: TMLServices represent an MLInstance which has been published as a service.
